text:
Apply to jobs manually are boring, repetitive, and somehow painful (if you ever applied to any job on Workday, you know!).   

I want to fix it by creating a bot that auto-applies to job for you (https://t.co/MWmEzL2N4u)

thoughts? 
cc:@_buildspace @FarzaTV https://t.co/7WBOpTKbGt
